commit_message:
docs: add worktree integration testing and documentation

Update CLAUDE.md with worktree workflow documentation:
- Add specks worktree commands (create, list, cleanup)
- Document cleanup procedure after PR merge
- Add troubleshooting section for common issues

Create worktree_integration_tests.rs with 4 tests:
- Full lifecycle test (create → list → merge → cleanup)
- JSON output format verification
- Dry-run mode testing
- Error handling verification
warnings: Manual policy: staged files only, awaiting user commit
